title: Web Development
description: Building responsive, high-performance websites and web applications using modern frameworks and best practices to ensure a seamless user experience.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Crafting intuitive and visually stunning user interfaces. I focus on user-centered design principles to turn complex ideas into functional digital experiences.

title: Data Analysis
description: Transforming raw data into actionable insights. I use statistical tools and visualization techniques to help drive informed, data-driven decisions.

title: IT Support
description: Providing comprehensive technical assistance, from hardware troubleshooting to software configuration, ensuring your systems run smoothly and efficiently.

title: WordPress Development
description: Designing and developing custom WordPress sites, including theme customization and plugin integration, tailored to your specific business needs.
